```{r}
library(data.table)
library(tidyverse)
library(sampleSelection)
library(SemiParSampleSel)
```


### women wages

```
proc qlim data=mroz;
      model inlf = nwifeinc educ exper expersq
                   age kidslt6 kidsge6 /discrete;
      model lwage = educ exper expersq / select(inlf=1);
   run;
```

```{r}
mroz <- fread("../data-raw/mroz-data.txt", na.strings = ".")
mroz
```

```{r}
m1 <- SemiParSampleSel(
  formula = list(inlf ~ nwifeinc + educ + exper + expersq + age + kidslt6 + kidsge6,
                 lwage ~ educ + exper + expersq),
  data = mroz,
  margin = c("probit", "N")
)
summary(m1)
```

```
lwage.Intercept	1	-0.552716	0.260371	-2.12	0.0338
lwage.educ	1	0.108351	0.014861	7.29	<.0001
lwage.exper	1	0.042837	0.014878	2.88	0.0040
lwage.expersq	1	-0.000837	0.000417	-2.01	0.0449
```

```{r}
m2 <- heckit(inlf ~ nwifeinc + educ + exper + expersq + age + kidslt6 + kidsge6,
                 lwage ~ educ + exper + expersq, 
             data = mroz,
             method = "ml")
summary(m2)
```
